Issue.creator: nageshbandaru
Issue.summary: While creating channel in 'Balance-transfer' example gives error The channel has been closed URL:grpcs://localhost:7050
Issue.description: at process._tickCallback (internal/process/next_tick.js:189:7) (node:29895) UnhandledPromiseRejectionWarning: Unhandled promise rejection. This error originated either by throwing inside of an async function without a catch block, or by rejecting a promise which was not handled with .catch(). (rejection id: 2) (node:29895) DEP0018 DeprecationWarning: Unhandled promise rejections are deprecated. In the future, promise rejections that are not handled will terminate the Node.js process with a non-zero exit code. >
